---
title: CARSWELL
author: ''
date: '2022-08-30'
slug: carswell
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $27.1K
  in 2020-2021 on contracts with CARSWELL. The average
  contract duration was 0.96 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $710.4K.
  The longest contract was 4 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $9.4M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '27.1K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2020-2021'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '26'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '8%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '51%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '201.7K'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '0.96'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '710.4K'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '4'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '9.4M'
---
